creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas and gift of Robert T. Coffland in memory of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rectangular panel; tan with black designs; freeform zigzagging lines running lengthwise; triangles and diamonds with parallel lines at long sides and at two corners
inscription: on back and one corner and at center in blue ink: OA
title: Barkcloth panel
